metas.name: Community
metas.description: Shares the quirky, ensemble comedy style of Scrubs and It's Always Sunny, with a focus on character dynamics.

metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: Similar absurdist humor to It's Always Sunny and Rick and Morty, with clever writing and running gags.

metas.name: The Good Place
metas.description: Combines comedy with philosophical themes, reminiscent of Rick and Morty and Futurama but with a more optimistic tone.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: Offers thought-provoking science fiction like Love, Death & Robots and Fallout, exploring the dark side of technology.

metas.name: The Expanse
metas.description: A well-regarded sci-fi drama similar to Foundation and Doctor Who, with complex characters and political intrigue.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: Intricate mystery with sci-fi elements, echoing the themes of Stranger Things and Foundation, with a focus on time travel.

metas.name: Fargo
metas.description: Darkly comedic crime anthology with compelling characters, in line with Brassic and The Night Manager.

metas.name: Mindhunter
metas.description: A gripping crime drama focusing on the psychology of serial killers, much like All Her Fault and HIS & HERS.

metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: Modern take on a classic detective, combining mystery and drama, similar to The Night Manager.

metas.name: Mr. Robot
metas.description: Intense drama with elements of mystery and psychological thriller, appealing to fans of HIS & HERS and The Night Manager.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: Positive and heartwarming comedy similar to Ted Lasso and Scrubs, with a focus on ensemble cast dynamics.

metas.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
metas.description: Upbeat and humorous police comedy, similar to Scrubs but in a precinct setting.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: Mockumentary-style comedy with supernatural elements, offering similar humor to It's Always Sunny but with vampires.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: Sci-fi comedy with a unique premise, blending humor with thoughtful ideas like Futurama.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: Dystopian sci-fi thriller with a compelling mystery, echoing the themes of Black Mirror and Stranger Things.

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: Sci-fi spy thriller with a parallel universe concept, appealing to fans of The Night Manager and Foundation.

metas.name: Killing Eve
metas.description: Sharp and stylish spy thriller with dark humor, similar to The Night Manager but with a female-led dynamic.

metas.name: The Queen's Gambit
metas.description: Character-driven drama with compelling storytelling, in line with Ted Lasso and All Her Fault.

metas.name: Mare of Easttown
metas.description: Gritty crime drama with a strong female lead, similar to HIS & HERS but with a different setting.

metas.name: Squid Game
metas.description: High-stakes drama with elements of mystery and social commentary, appealing to fans of All Her Fault and Stranger Things.

metas.name: Final Space
metas.description: Animated space opera comedy, similar to Rick and Morty and Futurama, but with a more sentimental tone.

metas.name: Disenchantment
metas.description: Animated fantasy comedy from the creator of The Simpsons and Futurama, set in a medieval kingdom.

metas.name: Bojack Horseman
metas.description: Animated comedy with a dark and introspective tone, exploring themes of depression and addiction.

metas.name: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners
metas.description: Visually stunning animated sci-fi with a mature storyline, similar to Love, Death & Robots and One-Punch Man.

metas.name: Arcane
metas.description: Beautifully animated action-adventure with a compelling story, appealing to fans of Love, Death & Robots and Stranger Things.

metas.name: Peep Show
metas.description: British sitcom with a unique point-of-view style, offering similar awkward humor to It's Always Sunny and Brassic.

metas.name: Derry Girls
metas.description: British sitcom set in Northern Ireland during The Troubles, combining humor with historical context like Brassic.

metas.name: Fleabag
metas.description: Darkly comedic British series with a strong female lead, appealing to fans of Brassic and All Her Fault.

metas.name: The IT Crowd
metas.description: Classic British sitcom with a focus on workplace dynamics and geek culture, in line with Scrubs and Community.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: Quirky sci-fi comedy with a unique detective premise, blending humor with mystery, similar to Doctor Who.

metas.name: Devs
metas.description: Mind-bending sci-fi thriller with a focus on technology and free will, in line with Black Mirror and Foundation.

metas.name: Maniac
metas.description: Surreal and thought-provoking sci-fi limited series with strong performances, similar to Love, Death & Robots and Black Mirror.

metas.name: Warrior
metas.description: Action-packed crime drama set in 19th century San Francisco's Chinatown, similar to Brassic and All Her Fault.

metas.name: Luther
metas.description: Dark and intense crime drama with a charismatic lead, similar to Mindhunter and HIS & HERS.

metas.name: Line of Duty
metas.description: Gripping police procedural drama with complex characters and twists, appealing to fans of The Night Manager and All Her Fault.

metas.name: After Life
metas.description: Darkly comedic drama exploring grief and loss, with moments of heartwarming connection, similar to Ted Lasso and Brassic.

metas.name: Mythic Quest
metas.description: Workplace comedy set in a video game studio, with a similar ensemble dynamic to Scrubs and Community.

metas.name: Undone
metas.description: Animated series with a unique rotoscoping style, exploring themes of mental health and reality, appealing to fans of Love, Death & Robots.

metas.name: Invincible
metas.description: Animated superhero series with mature themes and intense action, similar to One-Punch Man but with a darker tone.

metas.name: Blue Eye Samurai
metas.description: Visually stunning animated action adventure, similar to One-Punch Man and Arcane
